TopicTitle: textures differ from sph to lauch

Articles.Content:
i am trying to make a transparent glowing texture for the hub of some wheels im working on but im having issues, the relevent shader is "unlit transparent" and in the sph it looks perfect, exactly how i want it to look and then some (see below)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

once the craft is launched is goes spaz... the black sections are no longer transparent, the texture does not apply when there is just terrain behind it and they generally look terrible ....... see above

any ideas how i can keep the editor texture at launch or another way to get a transparent luminous texture?
